means: 双重的，由两个东西组成的

word_mean: 二元的，二等分的：指带有二个基数的数字系统
以2为基数的计数制。其中只有两个可能的不同值或状态的选择、机会或状况。

sentence.Network_en: The machine does the calculations in binary.
sentence.Network_cn: 这台机器采用二进制进行计算。

sentence.Network_en: Using binary notation is in fact just manipulating ones and noughts.
sentence.Network_cn: 使用二进制标号法实际上只运用1和0两个数.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 电脑硬盘的保养 - 天使@宝贝的日志 - 网易博客 ... 电池 Battery 二进制 Binary 位元密度 Bit Densiry.
表示二元 (Binary) 运算子的运算式。二元运算子是一种使用两个运算元的运算子，通常这两个运算元称为左运算元和右运算元。
二进位 (Binary) 　　为什麽我们要学二进位哎呀还不是该死的蠢电脑嘛它只懂得0和1那麽我们要和电脑沟通的时候也只好装蠢一些才行。
自考英语二词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... twin a./n. 双胞胎(的) binary a. 二，双；二进制的 n.双(体)；联星 speculation n. 推测，猜测；投机.

list.abs: 编程英语词汇 - 豆丁网 ... binary 二进制 binary search 二分查找 binary tree 二叉树.
TREE_百度百科 ... apple tree 苹果树 binary tree [数]二叉树；[计]二进制树形网络 big tree 大树；巨杉.
二元树(binary tree)的每个节点都只有两条分支.有的也允许一个节点有多个分支,不过,每棵树的本质还是二元树.就算一个节点上可有有 …
bin feeder 漏斗给料机binary alloy 二元合金binary compound 二元化合物
常见计算机英语词汇解释 - 豆丁网 ... branch 分支,支线 binary digit 二进制位,二进制数字 brush 电刷.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (in the sense 'duality, a pair'): from late Latin binarius, from bini 'two together'

entry.tran: 二进制的，二进位的(尤用于计算机领域)
entry.def: The binary system expresses numbers using only the two digits 0 and 1. It is used especially in computing.
Binary is the binary system of expressing numbers.

example.ex: The machine does the calculations in binary.
example.tran: 这台机器采用二进制进行计算。

entry.tran: 二元的；有两个不同部分的
entry.def: Binary describes something that has two different parts.

means.word_mean: 1. a system of two stars that revolve around each other under their mutual gravitation
1. of or pertaining to a number system have 2 as its base;
2. consisting of two (units or components or elements or terms) or based on two;

sentences.sentence: "a binary star is a system in which two stars revolve around each other"
"the binary number system has two as its base"
